title: My Successful KDP Keyword Research Method for Amazon Book Publishing
description:
Watch this video next on the most profitable KDP niches: https://youtu.be/-hkoScwvzDk

Publisher Rocket: http://bit.ly/2ThC390

Helium 10 (50% off and 10% off Deals): https://bit.ly/334S3A3

In this video I'm going to show you step by step my technique for finding and creating a list of keywords that I've used to rank my books at number one on Amazon and make sales. This method can be used whether you're publishing no content, low content, fiction or non fiction books and even if you're a publishing house or independent publisher author. 

Tools and Resources I use:

Gumroad Shop for Keywords and Interiors: https://paulmarles.gumroad.com
Creative Fabrica: http://bit.ly/3XLaKoc
Canva: https://bit.ly/paulcanva
Book Bolt (Use paul20 to get 20% OFF): https://bit.ly/3jY7K2L
Vecteezy: https://bit.ly/3z6AApA
Tubebuddy: https://www.Tubebuddy.com/paultube

On this channel I have many free videos on how to create KDP Amazon books and build an online income using your computer from home to create
